name: Too close (Webox)
description:
The temple is flooding and you need to help the blind scholar escape. Use your divine powers to keep her alive, the hope of survival is really low, do your best and keeep her alive.

# How to play

+ The character moves automatically until she hits a wall, when she hits a wall she will rotate counter clockwise

+ You have a few powers at your disposal

    + Time slow, to make a few decisions on a rush

    + Flood, force the temple to drop one level, to reveal more map on top

    + Zap, use it to open doors and making the character change her rotation direction, she will swap between clockwise and counter clockwise

    + Rock, place a rock to block a path, but be carefull don't get her stuck
